overview:
Marc Aufzug is the founder of the Endorsed Goods GmbH. At their eCommerce platform miacosa.de celebrities and experts present their favorite products.

Previously he founded together with Maik Metzen and Markus Koczy AKM3 GmbH in Berlin. The AKM3 GmbH has become one of the largest online marketing agencies in Germany. The focus of AKM3 lies in international search engine optimization and link marketing.

Starting point of his online marketing career was his work at the Rocket Internet GmbH. In the most successful startup incubator in Europe, he led the team for international search optimization for projects such as Zalando, Groupon and eDarling.

Marc started his professional career in consultancy and working for an online marketplace. He studied business administration at the RWTH Aachen and the UIC in Barcelona.
